entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds which take a single argument #100654
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle tests failing #100647
  • Custom Build Task Execution Order with NativeAOT Compilation #100646
  • I am COM and I must Release() (in ComWrappers) #100645
  • (Optionally) make Thread.SetApartmentState behavior to match [STAThread] on Main() on non-Windows platforms. #100639
  • [NAOT][Apple][mobile] Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64: do_vxsort_avx2 causing AppleAppBuilderTask to fail #100632
    9.0.0
  • [browser] wasmbrowser referencing a RCL breaks the dev server when project renamed #100631
    9.0.0
  • Unable to rename ICUDT.dat file in Blazor WASM App Hosted(client server) project publish #100638
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Running Buffers tests in parallel results in OOM #100628
    9.0.0
  • Valgrind reports "conflicting stores" problem in aot eventpipe implementation #100627

Closed

  • .NET 8 Runtime Bad Signature / Certificate for MacOS arm64 #100413
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Assertion failed '(varDsc->lvIsParam && !varDsc->lvIsRegArg) || isPrespilledArg' when running SVE unit tests #100101
    9.0.0
  • Valgrind: JIT noway_assert codeGen->genAddrRelocTypeHint((size_t)addr) != IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 #100600
    9.0.0
  • FileNotFoundExceptions caused by Windows Update installing updates for .NET #98576
  • Crash/Unhandled exception with .net runtime upgrade. #90869
  • Unhandled IOException failing superpmi-collect runtime tests on OS X arm64 Checked #90530
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: Regressions in System.Collections.TryAddGiventSize #96500
    9.0.0
  • Overflows are ignored in some cases when checked-converting from `Int128` to SignedInteger #99489
  • TestNonCollectibleType times out under GCStress #100576
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest #85331
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] HttpClient does not work inside Thread().Start() #100636
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement basic data stream reader and writer in C #99300
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Publish data stream spec #99299
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Runtime Aborts after executing Program::Main() #100597
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Threading.Tasks.Task.SpinThenBlockingWait(...) uses non supported API #44622
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebWorkerTest.WaitAssertsOnJSInteropThreads #97914
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] PlatformNotSupportedException Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #98804
    9.0.0
  • ARM32-linux: JIT/Directed/tailcall/more_tailcalls/more_tailcalls times out in GCStress runs. #100464
    9.0.0
  • QuicListener Not Including Intermediary Certificates Without Explicit ServerCertificateContext #100530
    9.0.0
  • How to implement c++ VARINET Type in C# #100480
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions BuildServiceProvider System.MissingMethodException failure #100571

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix VS user unhandled exception notification #100657
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Azure Linux 3.0 deps package #100656
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Test #100655
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add timeout for dpkg frontend lock #100653
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Change export name mangling to match expectations #100652
    area-Build-mono
  • [NO MERGE][cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100649
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100648
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • Fix SslStreamCertificateContext OCSP test failures #100644
    area-System.Net.Security
  • HttpContent disposal in HttpClientJsonExtensions #100643
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Extend ConfigurationProvider with Source property and Dispose sources when root is Disposed #100642
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Reloading sources in ConfigurationManager should not dispose IConfigurationSources, only providers #100641
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100630
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Ensure Array.CreateInstance over reference types works #100626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add basic cdacreader project #100623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #100342
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make host tests use single copy of shared framework #100588
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100199
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Avoid allocating collectible instances in the frozen heap (#100444) #100509
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Add workload metadata for automation #100651
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512, 8.0.5
  • Clean up macro in GetLogicalProcessorCacheSizeFromOS to include cacheSize as a parameter via a new argument CURRENT_CACHE_SIZE #100596
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix profiler enter callback init reg trash logic #100637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove CLANG_FORMAT_COMMENT_ANCHOR #100615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add log to SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException. #100525
    area-System.Net
  • [QUIC] Delete the ByteMixing MsQuic test #100640
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Remove true randomness from a libraries test #100633
    area-System.Xml
  • [LoongArch64] amend the disasmbly formate of lu52id and branches. #100568
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser][MT] fix void Main #100629
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable tail call generation for coreclr test Runtime_87393 #100593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark managed/Compilation test as NativeAotIncompatible #100625
    needs-area-label
  • Fix official build break #100624
    needs-area-label
  • Add extra logging to the unhandled exception test #100620
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add RequiresProcessIsolation in testcase Runtime_100437 #100605
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform manual intermediate certificate lookup when creating MsQuicConfiguration #100584
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Pass SourceBuiltSymbolsDir property to inner build #100612
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.SizeOf #100618
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Arcade log publishing instead of our own publishing #100566
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Avoid frequent calls to CertificateValidationPal.IsLocalCertificateUsed #100513
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser][MT] improve abort on web worker #100610
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Enable runtime tests in fullAOT LLVM mode on linux-x64 #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    arch-wasm, linkable-framework, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix the LargestVectorSize parameter for SVE test cases #100606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add Task.WaitAll overload for `IEnumerable<Task>` #100569
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Avoid loading ICU data early during mono startup #100587
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Split the HttpConnectionPool into multiple files #100614
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix assertion for auipc and lui #100578
    community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On dotnet publish for Mac, getting unclear error "error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly... System.InvalidOperationException: Unrecognized AssetType 'resource' " #40015
  • AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild failing to `new` F# projects #40011
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Update logic for how workload version is displayed #40005

Closed

  • `--create-manifest-if-needed` should be mentioned if no manifest exists #39329
  • relocate `global.json` under `.config/dotnet.json` or `.config/dotnet/global.json` #37281
  • We're seeing timeouts in some of the package install tests #36089
  • dotnet tool run <TOOL_NAME> doesn't work on Linux #33030
    9.0.1xx
  • Support `dotnet tool install` from local nuget package file #13429
    Backlog
  • runtime-options (--roll-forward) for local tools #26824
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add workload config command #39888
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2422523 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Relax `Add` requirement for collection expression conversions to types implementing `IEnumerable` #8034

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error running code action with `EnforceCodeStyleInBuild` in new Roslyn with .NET8 SDK #72879
  • AbstractFileHeaderDiagnosticAnalyzer uses `CustomSeverityConfigurable` but does not provide a way to set the custom severity #72876
  • The code I'm typing moves to a comment line without my permission #72875
  • Debug Assertion fails for RefSafetyAnalysis #72873
  • Visual Studio Auto Complete Error with Collection Expressions #72872
    Backlog
  • roslyn-lsp --stdio option (or --pipe with a client-created pipe) #72871

Closed

  • EnC emits incorrect delta when async lambda is removed and added back #72880
  • Why "InvocationExpressionSyntaxAnalyzer.Analyze" Is being called thousands of times in this syntax analyzer ? #72857

PullRequests

Created

  • Add helper for common pattern when creating solutions. #72881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure taggers that compute frozen partial data eventually move to a 'correct' final state. #72878
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Classify most PROTOTYPE comments by implementation phase #72877
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Merged

  • Fix SemanticModel docs #72870
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
  • Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Semantic snippets: Implement `do` snippet #72842
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cache manifest.webmanifest in PWA #54953
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect OpenIdConnectConfigurationSerializer Read() method does not parse UseInfoEndpoint correctly #54951
  • More fine grained settings for hot reloading #54949
  • Hot reload doesn't keep state when multiple static files are changed at once #54942
  • Blazor WebAssembly application hosted in IIS does not load until few tries and gives an ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54941
  • restore.cmd not working #54938
  • HttpContext.RequestAborted is not canceled when app is hosted under IIS with hostingModel = OutOfProcess #54936

Closed

  • Bug: Hard reload not triggered when navigating from Interactive page to SSR page via browser back button #54574
    8.0.x
  • "Angular and ASP.NET CORE" default template gives 404 once deployed in IIS #54161
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54934
  • ForwardedHeadersMiddleware isn't setting X-Original-Proto correctly #54904
  • Redis distributed cache does not need to use Lua #54685
  • JwtBearerPostConfigureOptions registration being override by PostConfigureAuthenticationSchemeOptions<TOptions> when calling AddJwtBearer #52641
  • .NET 7/8 SDK breaks .NET Framework compilation #54544
  • Blazor: add a @bind-value:before event #54916
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54908
  • Perf improvement: updates #54933

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54952
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Static pages amid global interactivity #54948
    area-blazor
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp testing deps #54947
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54937
    area-blazor

Merged

  • fix: added missing webtransport check before establishing a session #54927
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Force full reload on popstate #54877
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Enable fixed tests. #54917
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Swipe gesture not being recognized in collection view on Android #21647
  • Android - Hambutger icon is not visable on a page pushed on a Navigation Page #21646
  • Android - Navigation Title disappears if Flyout is set to a new window #21645
  • VisualElement.ToPlatform(mauiContext) fails when using `UseMauiCompatibility()` #21644
  • Border has an unexpected background animation #21643
  • SecureStorage.RemoveAll() exception #21642
  • Hamburger menu is always enabled #21641
  • TabbedPage: content not shown after readding #21640
  • ListView with Checkbox in ItemTemplate results in empty rows #21639
  • ScrollView with bindableLayout is not resized on Andorid #21634
  • AppX Deployment operation failed for package XXXX with error 0x80073CFB. The specific error text for this failure is: Another user has already installed an unpackaged version of this app. The current user cannot replace this with a packaged version. The conflicting package is XXX and it was published by CN=User Name. #21632

Closed

  • Linebreak in Label,Text XAML not displayed in App #21605
    Backlog
  • Html Label examples from Microsoft learn do not render correctly on either iOS or android #16810
    Backlog
  • Entry Text Color and Entry Background Color not conforming to Color Setting #21629
  • [MAUI][.NET8] System.InvalidOperationException will be thrown when clicking here to view full recipe. #21567
  • Unit Testing MAUI .net8.0 version facing manifests issue #21211
  • MAUI Hybrid fails to build on Mac when a JSON file is present #21633
  • [iOS] Keyboard hides Entry on Grid #20231

PullRequests

Created

  • Notifydata set changed on height change #21649
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
  • [Android] Fix Ripple Effect in ImageButton #21638
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727) and make sure Android works too #21636
    area/testing
  • [Android] Fix CarouselView behavior with device orientation changes #21635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • Don't worry about the size of the text #21628
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Applying global styles to shadows #20203
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute #21621
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When performing a Natural Language Search on MYSQL and limiting the number of rows returned, Entity Framework produces a warning #33479
  • NativeAOT: get to zero warnings #33478
    9.0.0
  • Inaccurate query warning about distinct operator after ordering with CROSS APPLY OPENJSON #33477
  • "Library e_sqlite3 not found" on .Net Framework 4.7.2 (SDK-style project) #33472
  • Generate shorter UnsafeAccessor names #33470

Closed

  • No suitable constructor was found for entity type 'CollectionEntry' #33469
  • Bug for Raw SQL queries for unmapped types not working #33453
  • Make change tracking and the update pipeline compatible with AOT/trimming #29761
    9.0.0-preview4
  • How to live with query filters added to root elements of inheritance hierarchy only? #33474
  • Global query filters do not produce same SQL statements as query by DbSet #33424
  • Internal NullReferenceException when using Owned Entities with TPH Inheritance #33465
    9.0.0-preview1
  • Compiled model: Use static binding instead of reflection for properties and fields #24900
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Compiled model: Generate lambdas used in change tracking #24904
    9.0.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the VMR configuration file #33480
    area-infrastructure
  • List<T> as inline collections implementation. #33476
  • Use CreateContainerIfNotExistsAsync on the Cosmos SDK to be compatible with RBAC #33473

Merged

  • Fix docs/names #33475
  • Update CODEOWNERS #33322
  • Handle private properties in the compiled model #33409
  • chore: remove repetitive words #33471
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Remove usages of AllRepoVersions.props #19317
  • Use ReferenceOnlyRepoArtifacts in more places instead of hardcoding SBRP #19315
  • Enable efcore in the VMR build #19313
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Installer Sync - Mainview #19312
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Add remaining PGO legs for the VMR #19311
  • Update artifacts baseline #19308
  • Add Unified Build produced NuGet package validation against official build #19304

Merged

  • Update EOL versions #19119
  • [8.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #19128
    DO NOT MERGE
  • [VMR] Try lighting up ARM32/ARM64 lanes #18883
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Add osx-x64 sdk content diff baselines #19309
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19310
  • Move source-build pipelines to sb content folder #19291
  • [8.0.1xx] Move source-build pipelines to sb content folder #19305
  • Update Application-Insights licenses #19250

Updated

  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19297
  • Make SmokeTests use repo infrastructure #19290
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19296
  • Copy symbols to intermediates #19303
